translations.translation: They will be bundled into it head first, they and the misled,
They will then be thrown into Hell with those who had gone astray
Then the idols and those who strayed will be hurled into the Fire headlong, one upon another,
The idol worshippers, the idols, the rebellious ones,
So they and all the astray were flung into hell.
Then they will be thrown on their faces into it (the Fire), they and the astray.
So they shall be thrown down into it, they and the erring ones,
Then they shall be pitched into it, they and the perverse
Then will they be hurled therein, they and the seducers
Then they will be thrown headlong into Hell, both they and the misguided ones,
Then they shall be hurled therein, they and the seduced ones.
Then they will be cast into it on their faces—they and the perverse,
Then they will be thrown headlong into the (Fire),- they and those straying in Evil,
Then they will be thrown on their faces into the (Fire), They and the Ghawun (devils, and those who were in error).
And they will be pitched into it, they and the perverse
Then they will be toppled into it, together with the seducers.
So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators
[26:94] Then they will be hurled, cast, into it, they and the perverse,

(Then they will be hurled therein) they will be cast all together in hell, (they) the disbelievers of Mecca and all the disbelievers among human beings (and the seducers) the disbelievers of the jinn and their deities,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { فَكُبْكِبُواْ فِيهَا هُمْ وَٱلْغَاوُونَ } معناه جُمِعوا فِيها بَعضُهم عَلَى بَعضٍ
 يُريدُ مُشركي قُريش
 وقال: دَمَّروا الكُلَّ هُم والغَاوون: معناهُ الآلِهةُ

translations.translation:
And his saying, {And they will be gathered in it, they and the jinn}, means that they will be gathered together in it, some on top of others.
 The partners of Quraysh wish


He said: "Destroy all of them, gods and mortals alike."

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما جرى عليهم ما جرى من التقريع والتوبيخ { فَكُبْكِبُواْ فِيهَا } أي: أُدخلوا في النار قسراً وقهراً { هُمْ } أي: الآلهة المضلة المغوية { وَٱلْغَاوُونَ } [الشعراء: 94] أي: العبدة الضالون

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
كما قوله تعالى: { فكُبْكِبُوا فيها } أي: أُلقوا في الجحيم على وجوههم
 مرة بعد أخرى
 إلى أن يستقروا في قعرها
 وفي القاموس: كبّه: قَلَبَهُ وصرعه
 كأكبه وكبكبه
 هـ
 أي: صُرِعُوا منكبين في الجحيم على وجوههم
 { هم } أي: آلهتهم { والغاوون } أي: الذين كانوا يعبدونهم
 وفي تأخير ذكرهم عن ذكر آلهتهم رمز إلى أنهم مُؤَخِّرُونَ عنها في الكبكبة ليشاهدوا سوء حالها
 فيزدادوا غماً على غم
